channel.title: 317 pi adding npc to pickpocket
channel.description:
so im guessing its in thieving.java?
at the bottom i found this command [code]public int[][] npcThieving = {{1,1,8,200,1},{18,25,26,500,1},{9,40,47,1000,2},{26,55,85,1000,3},{20,70,152,1000,4},{21,80,273,1000,5}};[/code]
but i wanted to add npc 32 so i did
[code]public int[][] npcThieving = {{1,1,8,200,1},{18,25,26,500,1},{9,40,47,1000,2},{26,55,85,1000,3},{20,70,152,1000,4},{21,80,273,1000,5},{32,40,62,1500,2}};[/code]
is that wrong?and is there a way i can add a wait command between each thieve. ppl can spam click it and keep steeling.
